text: Amath Dansokho (January 13, 1937"Ce que Dansokho a réellement dit à la Dic", Le Messager, 10 April 2006 . – August 23, 2019) was a Senegalese politician. He was Secretary-General of the Party of Independence and Work (PIT) for years. He was Minister of Urban Planning and Housing from 1991 to 1995 and again in 2000. He was mayor of Kédougou from 2005 through 2012. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Mayors Category:Senegalese politicians
title: Amath Dansokho
